title: A defence for mariage of priestes by Scripture and aunciente wryters. Made by Iohn Ponet, Doctoure of Diuinitee.
author: Ponet, John, 1516?-1556.
notes: At foot of title page: Cum sereniss. Regis priuilegio.
Answered by: Martin, Thomas.  A traictise declaryng and plainly prouyng, that the pretensed marriage of priestes, is no mariage (STC 17517).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
